alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 09 at 11:56AM EDT until May 10 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Ravenna...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EDT Monday the stage was 17.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 12.7 feet Saturday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued at 8 pm EDT Monday.
